### 2. Goal
Enhanced the live user experience on the VR Showroom during COVID-19 when offline experiences were restricted and maintained customer connection to Kia, resulting in potential sales. 

<br>

### 3. Project Details

- Created UX/UI sample documents which were then presented to over 10 local managers
- Managed over 30 countries launch schedules in4 regions with using the management tool notion
- Analyzed user data using adobe Analytics andGoogle Analytics in 4 regions (India, Mexico, Middle East Africa and South America)
- Cooperated with developers and UX designers to optimize the customer journey


<br>

### 4. Project Results

- Increased online booking rates by 5.7x on average through adding a ‘Book Online' button from 1.0 – 2.0, leading to higher customer engagement
- Improved average time spent in VR Showrooms by 68% through UX and UI updates from 1.0 - 2.0
- Expanded to the Asia Pacific region, persuading 2 out of 4 countries and increasing team’s profits by 27% through further UX and UI updates, 2.0 - 3.0
